qa_pairs.question: What 24-hour pharmacies are available on the Upper East Side?
qa_pairs.answer: CVS Upper East Side: 1396 2nd Ave – (212) 249-5699, Walgreens Upper East Side: 1328 2nd Ave – (212) 734-6081, Duane Reade 74th & 3rd: 1279 3rd Ave – (212) 744-2668

qa_pairs.question: What is the phone number for CVS Midtown East?
Which 24-hour pharmacies are located in Queens?
qa_pairs.answer: CVS Astoria: 2280 31st Street – (718) 204-5333, Walgreens Forest Hills: 104-25 Queens Blvd (718) 896-7901

How many 24-hour pharmacies are listed for the Upper West Side?
qa_pairs.answer: Four pharmacies: Duane Reade 94th & Broadway, Rite Aid Upper West Side (2833 Broadway), CVS Upper West Side, and Rite Aid Upper West Side (210 Amsterdam Ave)
